contextId.information: Receiving what God has promised believers is spoken of as though one inherits property or wealth from a family member. (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_metaphor]])

verseBefore: ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ أَيْضًا نِلْنَا نَصِيبًا، مُعَيَّنِينَ سَابِقًا حَسَبَ قَصْدِ ٱلَّذِي يَعْمَلُ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ حَسَبَ رَأْيِ مَشِيئَتِهِ،
